term.title: chronic toxicity

item.text: Effects which persist over a long period of time whether or not they occur immediately upon exposure or are delayed.

term.sources: 'Glossary of terms used in toxicokinetics (IUPAC Recommendations 2003)' Nordberg, M.;Duffus, J.;Templeton, D.M.; Pure and Applied Chemistry 2004 76(5) 1033
